body.name: VGOAL Backpack Shoulder Crossbody Chest Bag for Men with USB Charging Port
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 42 mins
features: Large capacity:This bag is large enough for 9.7" iPad, wallet, cell phone and other valuables. It can be served well as small travel sling bag, work bag, daypack, etc.

USB charging port design: Two simple steps to charge your electronic devices: First, connect your own power bank with the built-in USB extension cable inside the chest bag. Second, make your external USB cable connect with the external USB charging port, and then it can charge your cell phone or other electronic devices. (Note: power bank is not included.)
Perfect Ergonomic Design:Lock buckles on both sides allow you adjust the shoulder strap position according to your need and soft air permeability padded back cushion make you light and comfortable.

Multi-layer design: There are a main pocket, a front pocket and a zipper shoulder pocket of the whole bag. The main pocket includes a large-capacity layer for all you need in daily life, a layer fits for 9.7" ipad pro and a zipper pocket. You can keep something useful in front bag. it will be convenient that you can always get other necessary things from your strap pocket.
Fashion & Casual style:Stylish and concise design for every occasion :hiking, traveling,outdoor,office,business ect.This item is not intended for use by 12 years old and under

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The VGOAL Sling Backpack is a fantastic companion for travel! Its design is not only stylish but also incredibly functional. The chest bag is perfect for carrying essentials, and the crossbody sling offers convenience while on the go. The added USB feature is a game-changer, making it easy to stay connected while traveling. Overall, a sleek and practical choice for men on the move!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern Style Crossbody Bag
reviews.reviewText: My sister bought me this for Christmas. It was on my wish list and I couldn't be happier. It fits my laptop which is a surface pro 2 , My steam deck OLED fits in there within this case. I have space for all the cables and I need. Everything is secure and looks really great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this bag. I was using a backpack before I got this and it was so much so I would pack it full. This helps me be more mindful of what I am taking to and from work. There has been a rain spell here since I got it and I have never had an issue with rain getting in, and considering I keep my laptop in it that is a huge relief. My favorite thing about this bag is actually the padding for the laptop, I did not have my coffee one morning and the bag slipped out of my hand and hit the ground hard. I was half expecting to find my laptop with something wrong with it, but I took it out and it was like new. No issues at all. That told me I picked the right bag. My only wish is there being an exterior pocket, or being slightly larger front pocket. I often do not wear my glasses into the office and have to put them in my bag until the computer screen wears my eyes down. I have to just set it on top of my notebooks and it does not work great all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good bag
reviews.reviewText: The bag is light and easy to adjust on both sides whether wearing it on the left and right. I recently used this for my trip to Greece and I could wear it without an issue even in the hot weather.I like the color and it's a decent size. I can fit my 9.7 inch iPad Pro with a case in the middle. My Nintendo Switch OLED with case fits in the rear pocket. I put in two books, a notebook, my Anker Power Bank, a pen, ear buds, and my Power Beats Pro.I wouldn't put that much in but did it to show close to the max capacity. I couldn't get the battery charger part to work which is annoying. I took a star off for that and the fact that my iPad didn't fit in the rear pocket. Overall I would recommend it for EDC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent carry bag
reviews.reviewText: I needed something small just to carry a few essentials; wallet, glasses & case, keys, etc. and this works perfectly. It’s well made good zipper and its priced right plus the addition of the inside cell phone cord is a plus. Excellent bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: -I got this sling bag because the bag I had been using for work was not quite big enough to hold my 8" x 10" day planner and the corners were getting pinched. This bag, on the other hand, has more than enough space for notebooks of that size or electronics such as tablets and laptops. (Just make sure you're getting the larger size shown in my pictures, as I saw several reviews saying that the smaller bag is not big enough to hold a laptop.)-The cord for the USB adapter tucks into a small hidden zipper on the inside of the bag when not in use. Possibly a very small portable charger could fit inside the compartment with it, but I haven't tested that. A larger portable charger can tuck into one of the flat inner pockets inside the main pocket of the bag.-The small pocket on the back (the part that is up against your body) is just big enough to hold a large glasses case like shown, or maybe a small umbrella.-One minor downside is that the water bottle holder is on the inside rather than the outside of the bag. It's also kind of small and my 24oz metal bottle doesn't fit. But a 16.9oz standard plastic bottle or a metal can should fit just fine. It is also more secure to have the drink pocket on the inside to avoid your drink falling out or being stolen.-Overall this is an excellent backpack to take to work, school, hiking, the gym, and anywhere else you may need a smaller bag. I don't usually leave long reviews like this but this backpack really impressed me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zero G - Zero friction
reviews.reviewText: I love this sling back backpack. I bought it to replace the bag I used to carry my Ipad pro 12.9 which couldn't carry much more than the pad, a wallet and some gum...which also had the disadvantage of either requiring I use a hand to keep it on my shoulder, or putting it over on the opposite shoulder where it would dig into my muscles. This bag solves all these problems, and adds a bit more capacity so I can fit more "essentials that aren't paper thin" like curved sunglasses, thick key fobs, and backup batteries.I goes over the shoulder and has awesome padding that never cuts or rubs. The bag just stays where you align it to hang on your back - and more than once, I panicked thinking that I'd left it behind, only to realize it was on my back - it felt that natural and unobtrusive.One thing that MUST be fixed by the manufacturer is that the strap adjusting buckle too easily lets the strap slip when putting on or taking off the bag, thus losing the length adjustment to make the strap length fit my body. I solved this by buying 1x4inch sticky backed velcro strips. Totally fixed. Total happiness. Hey manufacturer - do this and make you bag perfect :-) Thanks for making such a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved the look and design, but it cannot hold too much weight, strap is tearing away from the bag , not sure but looks there is a weight limit.

I bought this bag as a travel bag when flying. It meets the size requirements for a "personal item" for airlines, but if you are looking for a tiny sling bag this might not be for you. I love it because it holds exactly what I want...my phone, chargers, power brick, passport, headphones etc. In addition to all that it will hold a small laptop and a tablet, but it can get a bit heavy with all that in it.I also really like the front zip pocket for quick access and the rear pocket for more secure storage. I hope the quality is good and it lasts.
Bastante practico y buena calidad del producto

Does everything I wanted hold wallet; Kindle; even small purchases.Only super minimal negative is that one-off the big pockets has a single zipper. You have to open most of the zipper to gain access. If you’re absent minded like me or careless and leave it partially open, you can loose some of it’s contents.

Excellent product, the only thing I think the company should have done was to stuff the bag so it wouldn't lose shape. When I received the bag it was flat almost returned it but I packed some paper inside for a few days and it went back to its original look. Other than that it's a bag very well made.
